description: Captain of the large destroyer Galguran, Shia Has carries approximately the same rank as http://anidb.net/ch7044 [Ru Baraba Dom], but is under his direct command as part of his fleet. She is more aggressive and forceful than Dom. She is harshly critical of the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]`s crew and falls to see http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] in the same light as Dom.
name: Shia Has
